newsitem.title: USA: CapMAC forms new unit for EU member states.
newsitem.headline: CapMAC forms new unit for EU member states.

text.p: Capital Markets Assurance Corp (CapMAC) said Tuesday it formed CapMAC Assurance S.A., a new AAA-rated insurance company, to write financial guarantee insurance in all European Union member states.
CapMAC Assurance will be based in Paris and will be a wholly-owned subsidiary of CapMAC, the company said.
Charles J. Lester, Managing Director and Head of CapMAC's Europe and Global Project Finance efforts, will be President of CapMAC Assurance.

"We have actively underwritten asset-backed issues in Europe since the early 1990s," Lester said. "In Europe, the issuance of asset-backed securities is rising sharply, as privatization increases and governments prepare to meet the economic convergence criteria for European Monetary Union.

"In addition, the move toward deregulation of markets and industries has posed a series of financial challenges requiring creative structured solutions. CapMAC Assurance will further diversify our capabilities in meeting our clients' needs."
